# Learn about API authentication here: https://plot.ly/ggplot2/getting-started # Find your api_key here: https://plot.ly/settings/api library(reshape2) library(plotly) sp <- ggplot(tips, aes(x=total_bill, y=tip/total_bill)) + geom_point(shape=1) # Divide by levels of "sex", in the horizontal direction sp + facet_grid(. ~ sex) ggplotly()
